action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3930, pursuant to the order of January 31, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was withdrawn in Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3930, pursuant to the order of January 31, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 7.

action.text: Amendment SA 3930 proposed by Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S574-575, S576-577; text: CR S574) To modify the sunset provision.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3930, pursuant to the order of January 31, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 7.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3930, pursuant to the order of January 31, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 7.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3930 proposed by Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 3911.
